channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New antibody shot could help protect babies from RSV
item.description: A newly approved shot could soon help protect babies from respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), the top cause of hospitalization in U.S. infants.

item.title: The complex reality of college student mental health: Data reveal both challenges and positive trends
item.description: The word "crisis" is used frequently and, I would argue, inaccurately, to depict the psychological well-being of today's college students.
